dc_title_s: Dolomiti, carta a rilievo plastico : Dolomites, plastic relief map
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially and with spot heights.; Relief section shows Dolomite Alps in full color, surrounding area shown in black, red, and blue on white for approaching roads and nearby cities.; Folded verso includes hotel advertisements.|57 x 60 centimeters|Scale not given.|General Map Collection
